item.title: 私募基金正在寻找首次公开募股后套现的新方法
item.description: 私募股权公司正面临双重困境。首次公开募股（IPO）市场是退出投资的通常途径，目前已逐渐重新开放，但还不足以让他们完全套现。获得报酬的 B 选项，即通过将资金列入公司资产负债表来借钱，只会使第一个问题变得更糟，因为这会吓坏股权投资者。【原文：Private equity firms are facing a double dilemma. IPO markets, the usual path for exiting investments, have been gradually reopening, but not enough for them to cash out completely. Option B for getting paid, borrowing the money by putting it on the company’s balance sheet, will only make the first problem worse by spooking equity investors.】

item.title: 印度考虑提高食糖出口配额以避免即将出现的供应过剩问题
item.description: 印度正在考虑允许糖厂在 2025-26 年度出口 150 万吨甜味剂的提案，因为丰收的前景引发了对即将出现的供应过剩的担忧。【原文：India is considering a proposal to allow sugar mills to export 1.5 million tons of the sweetener in 2025-26, as the outlook for an abundant harvest raises concerns about a looming glut.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧任命刘易斯为首席执行官，英国蒸馏酒商寻求改革
item.description: 随着健力士黑啤和尊尼获加的生产商在股价暴跌后寻求重振旗鼓，帝亚吉欧集团任命连锁超市乐购集团（Tesco Plc）前总裁戴夫-刘易斯（Dave Lewis）为新任首席执行官。【原文：Diageo Plc named Dave Lewis, the former head of supermarket chain Tesco Plc, its new chief executive officer as the maker of Guinness stout and Johnnie Walker seeks to reboot after a slump in its share price.】

item.title: 增长前景改善，高盛转为增持印度股票
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.）已转为增持印度股票，预计政府政策和企业盈利改善将帮助印度这个价值 5.4 万亿美元的市场赶上亚洲同行。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has turned overweight on Indian stocks, expecting government policies and improving corporate earnings to help the nation’s $5.4 trillion market catch up with Asian peers.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数直播：美国即将结束停摆，股市将反弹
燃料价格上涨后埃及通胀加快
item.description: 燃料价格上涨后，埃及通胀率自 5 月份以来首次加快，这增加了政府下周维持利率不变的可能性。【原文：Egyptian inflation quickened for the first time since May after a hike in fuel prices, increasing the likelihood authorities will leave interest rates unchanged next week.】

item.title: 美国政府停摆问题取得突破，国债收益率上升
item.description: 在美国参议院提出结束美国政府史上最长停摆的计划后，避险资产需求减弱，国债收益率全线上涨。【原文：Treasury yields rose across the curve as the demand for haven assets waned after the US Senate advanced a plan to end the longest US government shutdown in history.】

item.title: 英国濒临破产的资产为其垃圾贷款带来意想不到的优势
item.description: 加税迫在眉睫。借贷成本居高不下。通货膨胀率仍然远远高于目标。但对于英国公司的投资者来说，至少有一个亮点：英镑垃圾贷款。【原文：Tax rises loom. Borrowing costs remain stubbornly high. And inflation is still way above target. But for investors in UK companies there’s at least one bright spot: sterling junk loans.】

item.title: 人工智能需求放缓，台积电月度销售额增长放缓
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. reported slowing growth in its revenue in October, potentially another indication that AI demand is moderating as the market turns frothy.】

item.title: 据说外籍员工宿舍公司 TS Group 的所有者正在考虑出售该公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，新加坡外籍劳工专用宿舍供应商 TS Group Pte 的股东正在考虑出售该公司的控股权，交易价值可能至少为 5 亿新元（3.84 亿美元）。【原文：Shareholders of TS Group Pte, a Singapore-based provider of purpose-built foreign worker dormitories, are considering selling a controlling stake in the business in a deal that could be worth at least S$500 million ($384 million), according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国停摆临近结束，新兴市场股票和货币上涨
item.description: 新兴市场亚洲股市上涨，原因是对美国政府结束史上最长停摆的乐观情绪提振了风险偏好。【原文：Emerging-market Asian stocks rose as optimism over an end to the longest-ever US government shutdown boosted risk appetite.】

item.title: 雅加达校园爆炸事件后，印尼考虑限制电子游戏
item.description: 在雅加达发生一起造成近百人受伤的校园爆炸事件后，印度尼西亚正在权衡对《PUBG》等视频游戏的限制措施。【原文：Indonesia is weighing restrictions on video games like PUBG following a school blast in Jakarta that injured nearly a hundred.】

item.title: 沃达康报告利润创十多年来最大增幅
item.description: 沃达康集团（Vodacom Group Ltd.）上半年的利润猛增了三分之一，南非移动运营商在非洲大陆其他地区业务的盈利改善推动了利润十多年来的最大跃升。【原文：Vodacom Group Ltd. profit jumped by a third in the first half, with improved earnings at the South African mobile operator’s businesses elsewhere on the continent driving the biggest jump in profit in more than a decade.】

item.title: 是的，这是一个人工智能泡沫。原因如下
item.description:
在Merryn Talks Money节目中，艾伯特-爱德华兹（Albert Edwards）警告说，企业盈利可能看起来很强劲，但一旦借贷成本上升，这些盈利可能会变得同样脆弱。【原文：

On Merryn Talks Money, Albert Edwards warns corporate earnings may look robust, but they may prove just as fragile once borrowing costs bite.

】

item.title: 是的，这是一个人工智能泡沫。原因如下
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Société Générale）全球策略师阿尔伯特-爱德华兹（Albert Edwards）在 "梅林谈钱 "节目中警告说，企业盈利可能看起来很强劲，但一旦借贷成本上升，这些盈利可能会变得同样脆弱。【原文：On Merryn Talks Money, Albert Edwards, Société Générale global strategist, warns corporate earnings may look robust, but they may prove just as fragile once borrowing costs bite.】

item.title: 欧洲能源巨头的状况好于预期
item.description: 欧洲能源企业在第三季度的表现远好于预期，因为炼油利润的增长抵消了油价低迷的影响，尽管 2026 年的前景仍不明朗。【原文：Europe’s energy firms did much better than expected in the third quarter, as stronger refining margins offset the impact of subdued oil prices, though the outlook going into 2026 remains uncertain.】

item.title: 中美暂停航运互查，紧张局势出现缓和迹象
item.description: 特朗普政府暂停了对中国造船业的调查，这促使中国政府做出回应，搁置了自己的调查，并取消了对美国船只的特别港口费。【原文：The Trump administration has suspended a probe into China’s shipbuilding industry, prompting Beijing to reciprocate by shelving its own investigation and putting off special port fees for US vessels.】

item.title: 谷物期货上涨，因有迹象表明美国停摆可能即将结束
item.description: 芝加哥谷物期货周一上涨，原因是人们希望美国可能会达成妥协，结束有史以来最长的政府停摆，恢复对农业数据的访问。【原文：Chicago grains futures rose on Monday on hopes the US may be heading toward a compromise to end the longest government shutdown on record, restoring access to agricultural data.】

item.title: 新兴市场可以裸泳一段时间
item.description:
与美国相比，中国的信用意味着许多 国家将迎来有利的大潮。【原文：

China’s credit compared to the US means a favorable tide for many countries.

】

item.title: 摩根大通称香港结构性票据热潮超过韩国
item.description: 据摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A surging Hong Kong market has led to a boom in structured products linked to the city’s equities, so much so that it’s overtaken issuance from Japan and Korea, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 南非赢得世界银行 9.25 亿美元贷款，用于改造濒临崩溃的城市
item.description: 世界银行为南非批准了一笔 9.25 亿美元的贷款，用于支持一项为期六年、耗资三倍于此金额的计划，以振兴该国的主要城市。【原文：The World Bank approved a $925 million loan for South Africa to support a six-year program costing three times that amount, as the country seeks to revive its major cities.】

item.title: 美国政府关门临近结束，铝与铜一同上涨
item.description: 随着美国政府结束长达数周停摆的希望升温，铝与铜和其他工业金属一起走高。【原文：Aluminum advanced with copper and other industrial metals as hopes rose for an end to a weeks-long shutdown of the US government.】

item.title: 其他地区贸易限制加剧，中国钢厂转向沙特市场
item.description: 随着保护主义浪潮的兴起，东南亚需求的恢复和中东新市场的增长抵消了保护主义浪潮的影响，中国钢铁企业的出口量仍在不断创下新高。【原文：Chinese steelmakers are still flooding the world with record exports, as a rising tide of protectionism is offset by resilient demand in Southeast Asia and growth in new markets in the Middle East.】

item.title: 印度 IPO 市场蓬勃发展，投资者聚焦 Lenskart 上市
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: GoTo 因报道 Danantara 将参与 Grab 合并而跳涨
item.description: GoTo Gojek Tokopedia 的股价飙升至三个月来的最高水平，此前一位印尼政府官员称，东南亚国家的主权财富基金 Danantara 将参与其母公司与竞争对手 Grab 控股有限公司的合并计划。【原文：GoTo Gojek Tokopedia shares surged to the highest level in three months, after an Indonesian government official said the Southeast Asian nation’s sovereign wealth fund, Danantara, is set to be involved in a plan to combine its parent with rival Grab Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 行业组织称日本海上风电拍卖需要改革
item.description: 据一个行业组织称，日本的海上风电拍卖应包括更广泛的反馈和更好的定价标准。【原文：Japan’s offshore wind auctions should include broader feedback and a better pricing criteria, according to an industry group, following setbacks that have dented the country’s plans to decarbonize.】

item.title: Lenskart 8.21 亿美元首次公开募股后将在孟买上市交易
item.description: 软银集团支持的 Lenskart Solutions Ltd.公司准备在孟买开始交易，该公司首次公开募股共募集资金 728 亿卢比（约合 8.21 亿美元），并在社交媒体上引发了一场关于印度初创企业估值的讨论。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.-backed Lenskart Solutions Ltd. is poised to begin trading in Mumbai after an initial public offering that raised 72.8 billion rupees ($821 million) and triggered a debate on social media about India startups’ valuations.】

item.title: 香港第三次发售数字债券，扩展数字债券雄心
item.description: 香港正在推销一套新的以多种货币计价的 "数字原生 "债券，从而进一步推动香港成为全球数字资产中心。【原文：Hong Kong is marketing a new set of “digitally native” bonds denominated in multiple currencies, intensifying the city’s drive to become a global hub for digital assets.】

item.title: 卢克森称新西兰需要成熟的资产出售对话
item.description: 新西兰总理克里斯托弗-卢克松（Christopher Luxon）呼吁就政府资产所有权展开 "成熟的对话"，这是他的国家党打算在 2026 年大选中提出的一项重要政策纲领。【原文：New Zealand Prime Minister Christopher Luxon has called for a “mature conversation” about ownership of government assets, in a hint of a key policy platform his National Party intends to take to the 2026 election.】

item.title: 印度快速配送价格战冲击 Eternal、Swiggy 股价
item.description: 印度在线食品杂货配送领域的竞争日趋激烈，对市场领导者 "永恒 "有限公司及其上市竞争对手 Swiggy 有限公司的股价造成了压力。【原文：Intensifying competition in India’s online grocery delivery space is weighing on the shares of market leader Eternal Ltd. and its listed rival Swiggy Ltd.】
